io.name: SCISMKKZ0010301_INBOUND

<annotation> <documentation>수신정보건수</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> </simpleType> </element> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="rcvrInfo" type="tns:RCVR_INFO_TYPE"> <annotation> <documentation>수신정보</documentation> <appinfo> <p:adjustLength category="variableField" lengthFieldURL="RCVR_INFO_ROWCOUNT" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:api_data_area_dcd value="B" /> </appinfo> </annotation> </element> <element name="encYn"> <annotation> value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> <p:api_data_area_dcd value="B" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="1" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="encType"> <annotation> <documentation>암호화 방식</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <maxLength value="5" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="RCVR_INFO_TYPE"> <sequence> <element name="rcvrMdn"> <annotation> <documentation>수신자 전화번호</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> name="userId"> <annotation> <documentation>연동업체 관리 고객식별 ID</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> <p:api_data_area_dcd value="B" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="40" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>

base="string"> <maxLength value="100" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="campId"> <annotation> <documentation>캠페인ID</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="8" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="trId"> <annotation> <documentation>고객사 연동 번호</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> name="ordInfoRowcount"> <annotation> <documentation>주문정보건수</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="ordInfo" type="tns:ORD_INFO_TYPE"> <annotation> <documentation>주문정보</documentation> <appinfo> <p:adjustLength category="variableField" lengthFieldURL="ORD_INFO_ROWCOUNT" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:api_data_area_dcd value="B" /> </appinfo> </annotation> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="ORD_INFO_TYPE"> <sequence> <element name="ordNo"> <annotation> <documentation>기프티콘 주문번호</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level name="cpnoInfo" type="tns:CPNO_INFO_TYPE"> <annotation> <documentation>쿠폰정보</documentation> <appinfo> <p:adjustLength category="variableField" lengthFieldURL="CPNO_INFO_ROWCOUNT" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:api_data_area_dcd value="B" /> </appinfo> </annotation> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="CPNO_INFO_TYPE"> <sequence> <element name="cpno">
